title: New Game Mode ELO Resets
body:
New game modes would be actually fun if Riot would set our starting game mode ELO's to that of our ranked. I'm having a miserable time in Black Market Brawlers because the average players in my games are silver/bronze/unranked...

How is it fun for the bronze player who's 0/7/0 by 20 minutes? It's definitely not fun for any of his teammates either.
